cause.description:
STYROFOAM takes 50 YEARS to break down in the OCEAN while interfering with oceanic life.
STYROFOAM is said to be UNABLE TO BREAKDOWN in a landfill. Here are some other breakdown time ranges:
*Paper cups- 5-15 years *Plastic bags- up to 500 years *Glass bottles- 500 years * Banana peel- 2–10 days * Cotton rags- 1–5 months * Rope- 3-14 months * Orange peels- 6 months * Wool socks- 1–5 years * Cigarette filters- 1–12 years * Leather shoes- 25–40 years * Nylon fabric- 30–40 years * Plastic six-pack holder rings- 450 years * Diapers and sanitary pads- 500–800 years
1. Styrofoam production must end here.
2. The future of our earth should not be threatened by such products.
cause.name: STYROFOAM IS THE ENEMY!
